title: Mahindra Holidays in talks with several states for building, acquiring resorts
description: Mahindra Holidays & Resorts is investing Rs 500 crore in Andhra Pradesh and exploring investment opportunities in Rajasthan, Gujarat, Tamil Nadu, and Jammu & Kashmir. They have signed MoUs with Tamil Nadu and Uttarakhand for investments worth Rs 1,800 crore.
